attributes.action: properly honour the passengers who stood againts the 21/7 bombers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A number of passangers, including two in thier 70's,did not flee when the bombers struck, instead they confonted and chased the would be mass murderers and should be reconised by our establishment as the heros that they are. they were not being paid to protect our liberty, but were reacting in ways and with the courage with which we can only hope our policemen and women and our army soldiers would react.  we can not blame those who ran, but we should honour those who did not, and hope that we may be so brave.
